cookiesPage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPage.s1p: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to "remember" your actions and preferences.
cookiesPage.s2p: TransForo uses cookies to improve your browsing experience, understand how you interact with our site, and personalize your experience.
cookiesPage.s31desc: These cookies are necessary for you to browse the site and use its basic features.
cookiesPage.s31note: ‚úì These cookies do not require consent under applicable law
cookiesPage.s32purpose: Purpose: Remember your preferences and personalize your experience
cookiesPage.s32desc: These cookies allow the site to remember your choices and provide enhanced features.
cookiesPage.s33purpose: Purpose: Understand how visitors use the site
cookiesPage.s33desc: These cookies collect aggregated and anonymous information about how visitors use the website.
cookiesPage.s4p: In some cases, we use cookies provided by trusted third parties:
cookiesPage.s4i1: Supabase: For authentication and database management
cookiesPage.s4i3: Analytics services: To understand user behavior
cookiesPage.s4note: These third parties have their own privacy policies.
cookiesPage.s5p: TransForo uses two types of cookies by duration:
cookiesPage.s5i1: Session cookies: Temporary, deleted when you close your browser.
cookiesPage.s5i2: Persistent cookies: Remain on your device for up to 1-2 years or until you delete them.
cookiesPage.s6p: You can manage or delete cookies according to your preferences.
cookiesPage.s61p: All modern browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings.
cookiesPage.s61i2: Accept only cookies from specific sites
cookiesPage.s61links: Links to cookie management instructions by browser:
cookiesPage.s62p: When you first visit TransForo, you'll see a cookie banner where you can accept or reject non-essential cookies.
cookiesPage.s7p: If you decide to block or delete cookies, some parts of the site may not work correctly:
cookiesPage.s7i1: You won't be able to stay logged in
cookiesPage.s7i2: You'll lose your language and theme preferences
cookiesPage.s7i3: Some personalized features won't be available
cookiesPage.s7i4: User experience may be negatively affected
cookiesPage.s7note: Note: Strictly necessary cookies cannot be disabled.
cookiesPage.s8p: Some browsers include a "Do Not Track" feature. We respect your privacy and work to improve our tracking practices.
cookiesPage.s9p: We may update this Cookie Policy occasionally. We recommend reviewing this page periodically.
cookiesPage.s10p: For more information about cookies and how to manage them, visit:
cookiesPage.s11p: If you have questions about our Cookie Policy, you can contact us through our
cookiesPage.summaryI1: ‚úì We use cookies to improve your experience
cookiesPage.summaryI2: ‚úì Some cookies are essential for site operation
cookiesPage.summaryI3: ‚úì You can manage cookies through your browser or our banner
cookiesPage.summaryI4: ‚úì We respect your privacy and comply with GDPR

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.s1p: At TransForo, we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.
privacyPage.s21p: When you create an account, we collect:
privacyPage.s23p: We store all content you publish:
privacyPage.s3items: Provide and maintain our service|Create and manage your account|Personalize your experience|Communicate with you|Moderate content|Prevent fraud|Improve our service|Comply with legal obligations
privacyPage.s4p: We process your personal information under these legal bases:
privacyPage.s4i1: Consent: You gave consent when registering
privacyPage.s4i2: Contract: Necessary to provide the service
privacyPage.s4i3: Legitimate interest: To improve and secure the platform
privacyPage.s4i4: Legal obligation: To comply with applicable laws
privacyPage.s5p: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with:
privacyPage.s5i1: Other users: Your public profile and content are visible
privacyPage.s5i2: Service providers: Supabase, email services, analytics
privacyPage.s5i3: Legal authorities: When required by law
privacyPage.s6items: Password encryption|Secure HTTPS connections|Row Level Security in database|Two-factor authentication|Regular audits|Encrypted backups
privacyPage.s7p: We retain your information while your account is active or as needed.
privacyPage.s7note: You can request account deletion at any time.
privacyPage.s8note: To exercise these rights, contact us through our contact page.
privacyPage.s9p: We use cookies and similar technologies. See our Cookie Policy for details.
privacyPage.s10p: TransForo is intended for persons over 18 years of age.
privacyPage.s11p: Your data may be transferred to servers outside your country, complying with applicable laws.
privacyPage.s12p: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally.
privacyPage.s13p: If you have questions, you can contact us through the
privacyPage.importantNote: This is a community for trans professionals. We treat your information with the utmost respect and confidentiality.

termsPage.title: Terms and Conditions
termsPage.s1p: By accessing and using TransForo, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
termsPage.s2p: TransForo is an online forum platform. We provide a space for:
termsPage.s2items: Sharing professional experiences|Connecting with colleagues|Exchanging information and advice|Building a supportive community
termsPage.s3p: To use certain features, you must:
termsPage.s3items: Be over 18 years old|Provide accurate information|Keep your password secure|Report unauthorized use|Accept responsibility for your account
termsPage.s4p: By using TransForo, you agree NOT to:
termsPage.s4items: Post illegal or abusive content|Impersonate another person|Violate intellectual property rights|Post spam|Interfere with site operation|Collect information without consent|Share personal information of others|Promote illegal activities
termsPage.s5items: You retain all rights to your content|You grant us a license to use your content on the platform|You are responsible for your content|You warrant you have the right to publish it|We may remove content that violates these terms
termsPage.s6p: TransForo allows clearly marked NSFW content. It must comply with applicable laws.
termsPage.s7items: Edit, delete, or reject any content|Suspend or terminate accounts|Modify or discontinue the service|Disclose information when required by law
termsPage.s8p: TransForo's design, code, and graphics are protected by copyright.
termsPage.s9p: TransForo is provided "as is" without warranties.
termsPage.s9items: The service will be uninterrupted|Defects will be corrected|The service will be virus-free|Results will be accurate
termsPage.s10p: In no event shall TransForo be liable for direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
termsPage.s11p: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless TransForo.
termsPage.s12p: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.
termsPage.s13p: You may terminate your account at any time. We may terminate or suspend your account for any violation.
termsPage.s14p: These terms shall be governed by applicable laws.
termsPage.s15p: If you have questions, you can contact us through the
termsPage.acceptanceNote: By using TransForo, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms and Conditions.
